articles.title: Brazil greenlights COVID-19 vaccines for young children aged 5-11 - Global Times
articles.description: Brazilian health authorities authorized COVID-19 vaccines for children aged 5 to 11 on Wednesday, as South America's most populous country faces a rapid increase in cases due to holiday gatherings and the arrival of the Omicron variant.
